input: Should I sell my company now or wait?
context: Your company is valued at $10M. 80% of revenue comes from one customer. Market conditions are uncertain but could improve next year. You have received an offer to sell.

outcome_truth.reasoning: Customer announced 10-year contract extension before year ended; option value of waiting was high. Selling would have been 30% suboptimal.
